meanings: (부사) alone, (all) by oneself, (all) on one's own (=홀로)
Adverb by oneself, on one's own
결혼하지 않고 live as a single

vlive.korean: '왜 산하 혼자 서있어?' "Why are you standing alone, San-Ha?" 듣기 View video ASTRO : READ WITH SANHA📖
[황량한 땅 위에 딸랑 혼자 서있는 스낵카 한 대] 그니까. [The food truck in the middle of nowhere] Exactly. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : 통하는 여행 시즌 3 - 일본 사가현 3회(사가 도착&여정 시작)
vlive.english: [The food truck in the middle of nowhere] Exactly.

vlive.korean: 팬분이 혼자 서있는 게 아니라 저랑 MC 가운데에 서신다는 얘기입니다. The fan won't stand alone, they can stand between the MC and me. 듣기 View video Park Hae Jin : [Park Hae-Jin] True story - No. 33
vlive.english: The fan won't stand alone, they can stand between the MC and me.

vlive.korean: 왜 혼자야? Why are you alone? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 남자 때문에 인간관계 X됨 [엑스엑스(XX)] - 하이라이트
"혼자 보러 다녀?" "Do you watch plays alone"? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간

examples.korean: She stood alone on stage in the spotlight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 스포트라이트를 받으며 무대 위에 혼자 서 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She stood alone on stage in the spotlight. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The house stands by itself in an acre of land. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 집은 1에이커의 대지 내에 혼자 서 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house stands by itself in an acre of land. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She looked very vulnerable standing there on her own. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 거기에 혼자 서 있는 그녀는 너무나 연약해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She looked very vulnerable standing there on her own. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A sheep is standing alone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 양 한 마리가 혼자 서있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A sheep is standing alone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The man is standing alone in front of the counters. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 남자가 카운터 앞에 혼자 서 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The man is standing alone in front of the counters. Add to Wordbook
